column4: oh what do I care, living a christian life got me nowhere in the end

I like the way linux deals with hidden files, it just makes file names starting with a '.' hidden, but windows makes it a file attribute which is bound to take up lots of space in the file system table in the long run
for proof, take a look at any LG Cell Phone
or Samsung for that matter
